title: Beat2x
content: Beat2x is DDR-style rythm game where the goal is to time the button presses to line up with the music beat.
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play

title: Celeste Classic
content: Celeste Classic is a C source port of the original celeste (Celeste classic).
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play.

title: Dome Romantik
content: Dig your way through to the core of the planet. Mine minerals, bring them back to your dome and install upgrades just in time to defend from hostile lifeforms.
instrunctions: Launch DomeRomantik.sh

title: Eity
content: Eity is a rhythm game with cool music.

title: F1 Race
content: F1 Race is a port of the F1 Race game from MTK OS.
instrunctions: All game files are included and game is ready to play

title: Community: Journey to the Center of Hawkthorne
content:
This 2d platformer is based on Community's Digital Estate Planning episode. 

A group of warriors are summoned to the kingdom of Hawkthorne™ to take on a quest to recover the fabled "White Diamond of Discipline"™ found in the depths of the dark pit of despair known as The Black Cave™.
type: Community: Journey to the Center of Hawkthorne
genres: Community: Journey to the Center of Hawkthorne

title: hijinx/hijinx.port.json
content: Hijinx is a platformer that incorporates the theme of "pick your poison" by having players pick from a set of handicaps for each level, with help from Carl, the bumbling tortoise.
instrunctions: Game files are included.

title: xkcd Hoverboard
content: Standalone version of xkcd 1608 Hoverboard game
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play.

title: Laser Kombat
content: Laser Kombat is a classic puzzle game, now available for modern systems. Destroy all the tanks to beat the level. Stay out of line of sight, though, or you will get shot. Shoot your lasers at mirrors, blow up bomb or push your enemies into water with movable blocks to win.
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play

title: LBreakoutHD
content: LBreakoutHD is a scaleable 16:9 remake of LBreakout2. You try to clear levels full of different types of bricks and extras by using your paddle to aim balls at the bricks.
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play.

title: Me and My Shadow
content: Me and My Shadow is a puzzle/platform game in which you try to reach the exit by solving puzzles. Spikes, moving blocks, fragile blocks and much more stand between you and the exit. Record your moves and let your shadow mimic them to reach blocks you couldn't reach alone.
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play.

title: Neverball
content:
Tilt the floor to roll a ball through an obstacle course within the given time. If the ball falls or time expires, a ball is lost.

Collect coins to unlock the exit and earn extra balls. Red coins are worth 5. Blue coins are worth 10. A ball is awarded for 100 coins.

Includes Neverputt.
instrunctions:
All files are included and game is ready to run.

Dpad and left stick are movement
A is select/enter
B is back/escape
Select is escape
Start is enter

title: Nonny
content: Nonny is a simple nonogram game that lets you play and create nonogram puzzles!
instrunctions: All files are included and ready to play.

title: Nova Pinball
content:
A pinball game created with the Love game framework.

Your mission: Make the star go nova. There are in-game hints that point out the next target to achieve your goal.

title: NPuzzle
content: NPuzzle is a 15 puzzle style sliding game where you have to rearrange the tiles in order.
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play.

title: Open Great Giana Sisters
content: Open Great Giana Sisters is a Free Software/Open Source implementation/remake of The Great Giana Sisters.
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play.

title: OpenSupaplex
content: OpenSupaplex is a 1:1 reimplementation of the original game in C and SDL, with just a few changes to make it easy to use with game controllers, and also easy to port to any platform.
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play. Every levelset requires a there to be a player created. Levelset 1 had a premade PLAYER1 created but all others will require you to create a new one. You can use start + dpad down to enter text input mode.

title: Planet Waves
content: An arcade tower defense about protecting a small planet made for the gotm.io jam #3 by Escada Games
instrunctions: All files already included. Run PlanetWaves.sh

title: Raptor
content: Reversed-engineered source port from Raptor Call Of The Shadows
instrunctions: Shareware files are included and game is ready to run. See readme for detailed instructions for full version game files and other configuration options. In the name and callsign section, make sure the crosshair is not on input fields, press start + down to enable text entry. Press start once done to complete entry.

title: Retro Time
content: RetroTime is a game containing 8 retro based games playable in 3 game modes being Retro Carousel, Time Attack and Lives mode.
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play.

title: SDL Sopwith
content: SDL Sopwith is a port of the game Sopwith, which was originally by BMB CompuScience Canada.
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play.

title: Thermomorph
content:
An Alien-inspired survive-the-night horror game, created in Love2D.

Your crew is dead. Unidentified creatures stalk the halls of your mining ship. Armed with a motion sensor and a flamethrower, you must survive until the escape pod is repaired.

title: Upo
content:
Upo is a procedurally generated music game.
Your goal is to avoid collision with flying objects in rhytm to the music.

title: Wizznic
content: Wizznic! is an open-source, freeware remake of Puzznic, recreating the original arcade levels, the NES ones and including fan-made puzzle packs with new custom levels. The gameplay remains exactly the same, where the player has to move individual tiles, arranging them inside a restricted space to create groups of identical blocks and make all disappear by touching each other. Elevators and other features gradually start to appear on later levels.
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play

title: Wordle SDL
content:
Wordle SDL is a port of a clone of Wordle made with SDL.

Wordle is a web-based word game created and developed by Welsh software engineer Josh Wardle, and owned and published by The New York Times Company since 2022. Players have six attempts to guess a five-letter word, with feedback given for each guess in the form of colored tiles indicating when letters match or occupy the correct position.
instrunctions: All files are included and ready.

title: ZGloom
content: ZGloom is a re-implementation of Amiga FPS Gloom, including support for Gloom 3, Gloom Deluxe and Zombie Massacre.
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to run.

title: Znax
content: Znax is a remake of a game by Nick Kouvaris. It is a sort of puzzle / arcade game where you as the player need to select 4 blocks of the same color and form rectangles as big as you can
instrunctions: All files are included and game is ready to play.
